name: Pokémon Iberia
storyline: The Iberia region is a place full of life, party and bustling cities, but it also hides dark and sinister secrets that have been hidden for years. In Iberia there are Pokémon that have adapted uniquely to the region, acquiring characteristics of its ecosystem, history or folklore. During the adventure, characters with various intentions will appear: from pleasant companions to greedy villainous teams, to hilarious ruffians and corrupt politicians.
summary:
Pokémon Iberia is a game in the Pokémon franchise made by and for fans.

It is based in Spain and other places in the Iberian Peninsula, with many nods to its history and popular culture.

Made with RPG Maker XP and Pokémon Essentials, it can be enjoyed on Windows, Mac OS and (partially) on Android.
